incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time: 31/07/2025 00:00 UTC End time: 31/07/2025 01:00 UTC Service impact: Bandwidth perturbation might be observed on public and private networks if LACP is active on the server. Service improvement: As part of our policy of continuous improvement, we are going to carry out maintenance on network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA6][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Workflow Management service, Mistral. Here are the details of the maintenance: Start time : 31/07/2025 10:30 UTC End time : 31/07/2025 12:30 UTC Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts : - Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. - Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offering in RBX1. Start time : 28/07/2025 18:00 UTC End time : 01/08/2025 02:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers will be temporarily unavailable for a while during maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a moving some servers from RBX1 to RBX3. The customers received a communication from our technical support to inform them of the migration. Thank you for your understanding.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Virtual Private Servers offer. Start time : 04/07/2025 09:00 UTC End time : 04/08/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : Below-mentioned images will no longer be available to purchase or use. Several images currently offered as part of our VPS offering have reached, or are approaching, End of Life (EoL). As of August 4th, 2025, these images will be officially removed from our VPS catalog in accordance with our End of Life policy. You can read more about our distribution End of Life policy here : https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-vps-image-life-cycle?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0050801 Below is the complete list of images, as well our recommendations and alternatives for VPS environments.
EoL DistributionEoL / EoS dateAlternative DistributionRecommended action
Centos 730/06/2024AlmaLinux/ Rocky LinuxBackup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3705/12/2023Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3821/05/2024Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
If you use automation to deploy your infrastructure with any of these images, we strongly recommend that you either switch to another distribution or upload your own image to use instead. You can refer to the following guides to : Upgrade operating system: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upgrade-operating-system?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051306 Upload your image: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upload-own-image?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051319 Service improvement : As part of our End of Life policy, the above-mentioned images will no longer be available for purchase or reinstallation in our VPS offering. For any question, please reach out to our support team. Thank you for your understanding.
